file_content.text: Sentient beings! The glorious and colossal Giradda the Hutt welcomes you to The Pit!
Shut up! I'm here to see blood!
Take it away, Baron Deathmark!
Ladies and gentlebeings! Welcome to The Pit! The bounteous and magnificent Giradda the Hutt salutes you!
Tell them the winner may eat my translator!
May the winners feast on victory! Baron Deathmark?
Welcome to The Pit, sentient beings! The celebrated Giradda the Hutt commends your choice in entertainment!
Someone kill this loud little man!
Over to you, Baron Deathmark!
Listen up! These are the rules of Huttball!
Two teams, Frog-Dogs and Rotworms, chosen by random draw! One ball, slippery as a greased Hutt!
Grab the ball, throw the ball. Get the ball over the opposing team's line any way you can and your team gets a point.
Weapons, name-calling and cheating... are all encouraged!
But do not kick the ball! Hutts don't have feet! Show our sponsor Giradda the respect he deserves!
Let's play Huttball!
Frog-Dogs grab the ball. Run, Frog-Dogs!
Frog-Dogs have the ball, but for how long?
Frog-Dog throws to Frog-Dog. Nice pass!
Frog-Dog pass connects! Big gain!
Frog-Dog pass incomplete. Rotworm ball!
What a terrible pass. Bad day for Frog-Dogs everywhere.
Rotworms destroy the ball handler!
Splat goes a Frog-Dog! Get a cleaner droid!
Frog-Dog pass... goes nowhere fast!
Perhaps the worst throw in Frog-Dog team history. Really, really terrible!
Frog-Dog crushed! Spectacular Rotworms play!
Rotworms take out a Frog-Dog! Brutal!
Watch those hazards, Frog-Dogs!
Ouch! That was one dumb Frog-Dog!
Frog-Dogs score!
A fantastic score! Give those Frog-Dogs a point!
Frog-Dogs have one point.
Frog-Dogs have two.
Frog-Dogs have three points.
Frog-Dogs have four.
Five points, Frog-Dogs.
Six points for the Frog-Dogs.
It is over! Many died so that we might laugh!
Mighty Giradda the Hutt declares the Frog-Dogs today's winners! Honor and, uh, recovery is theirs!
Rotworms have the ball. Show us what you've got, Rotworms!
Rotworm ball! Let's see if they can keep it!
Rotworms pass--success! That's how it's done!
Rotworm pass is good for a gain!
Rotworm pass is a complete failure! Frog-Dog ball!
Rotworm pass intercepted! Oh, the disgrace!
The Frog-Dogs just pulled the ball handler apart!
Rotworm ball handler is down!
Pass incomplete. Rotworms need a vision checkup.
Pointless throw. Rotworms are losing it, folks!
Rotworm down. Just destroyed by the Frog-Dogs!
That'll hurt in the morning. Frog-Dogs on a rampage!
Stay away from the hazards, Rotworms!
Pathetic! Oldest obstacle on the course, Rotworm!
Rotworms score!
What a move! Score one for the Rotworms!
Rotworms have one.
Rotworms have two points.
Rotworms have three.
Rotworms have four points.
Rotworms with five.
Rotworms have got six points.
This was entertaining--but now I am hungry! Match over!
Mighty Giradda the Hutt declares the Rotworms today's winners and praises their, uh, voracious talent!
Neutral ball. Let's go berserk!
Time's almost up! Somebody kill someone!
It's... it's a tie! Unacceptable!
We're in Sudden Death! First team to score--or obliterate the other side--wins!
These teams are evenly matched. Let's hope somebody gets pulped real soon.
Rotworms may as well crawl in a hole. They're already playing dead!
Looks like the Frog-Dogs have a new strategy--let the Rotworms win!
Today's match is sponsored by Brassk's Trandoshani Flatcakes--the only flatcakes served with authentic fruit from the elder trees of Kashyyyk. Now back to the mayhem!
Today's Huttball obstacles are provided by Czerka Corporation. Czerka: Brilliant Solutions for a Brighter Tomorrow. Now back to the match!
Today's post-match cleanup provided by Korrfun's All-Star Salky Kibble. Shouldn't your salky eat the best talent around? Now, back to the brawl!
Let's raise the stakes! Here come the hazards!
This match needs excitement! Let's mix it up!
More action! More obstacles! More pain!
No kicking!
Was that a kick? What did I say about kicking the Huttball?
Who just kicked the Huttball? I'm watching you!
Hello there, sport fans! The magnanimous Giradda the Hutt welcomes you to Vandin's state-of-the-art Huttball coliseum--the Sky Shredder!
Tell them to buy more concessions! I want a new pleasure barge!
Welcome to the Sky Shredder--the one and only home of Huttball on the scenic world of Vandin!
The time has come--for Huttball! Giradda the Hutt bids you welcome to the Sky Shredder for today's glorious contest.
This match has amused me! Those who have won may live!
Mighty Giradda appreciates your patronage. But why stop there? Increase his favor by purchasing collectible memorabilia in our gift shops!
Patrons with difficulty breathing in Vandin's atmosphere may rent a suitable respiratory apparatus at any ticketing kiosk.
Huttball at the Sky Shredder is brought to you in part by the Makeb Tourism Initiative. Makeb: We Haven't Blown Up Yet.
This is boring!
Pass the ball--quickly!
My master is bored--pass the ball!
Hahaha!
Are you just as hungry as our players? Make your way to one of our many convenient food vendors as Baron Deathmark gets things started.
Soon I will own this entire planet, and all who dwell here!
His eminence, Giradda the Hutt, praises this world's industrious peoples. Baron Deathmark?
Enough talk! Start the killing!
Let's go to our host: Baron Deathmark!
These tiny players are spry! They have earned my favor!
Giradda the Hutt calls this match in favor of the Rot-Worms! Well played!
Congratulations, Frog-Dogs! Giradda the Benevolent has named you as today's champions!
If only they had passed the ball....
All who fail to amuse Giradda face grave repercussions.
